mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_wdate, b_category, b_views, b_like) VALUES (#{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer}, #{b_wdate}, #{b_category}, #{b_views}, #{b_like})
mapper.update: UPDATE board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content}, b_wdate=#{b_wdate}, b_category=#{b_category} WHERE b_number=#{b_number}
UPDATE board set b_views=#{b_views} WHERE b_number=#{b_number}
UPDATE board set b_likes=#{b_likes} WHERE b_number=#{b_number}
